Package Tools

package Tools
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Controller
    The class Controller plays the simulation.
    Individual
    An individual has only information about itself.
    MainLocalDynamics
    Class MainLocalDynamics is the starting point of this simulation application.
    PopulationStatus
    Class PopulationStatus stores all the properties and information about the total population.
    RandomVariable
    Class to generate random variables for different inputs
    RuleSet
    Class to define the complete ruleset of the simulation.
    SaveObject
    Class to save the state of a cell
